Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.json.parsing

Class JsonPathUtils

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.json.parsing.JsonPathUtils
@Component public class JsonPathUtils extends Object
Utility class for working with JSON paths and extracting data from complex JSON structures.

      Returns:
      The string value
      Throws:

    • forEachInArray

      Process each element in a JSON array with a consumer
      Parameters:
      root - The root JSON node
      arrayPath - The path to the array
      consumer - The consumer to process each element
      Throws:
      ConfigurationException - if the path doesn't exist or is not an array

    • mapArray

      public <T> List<T> mapArray(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode root, String arrayPath, Function<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode,T> mapper) throws ConfigurationException
      Map each element in a JSON array to a list
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type to map to
      Parameters:
      root - The root JSON node
      arrayPath - The path to the array
      mapper - The function to map each element
      Returns:
      A list of mapped elements
      Throws:
      ConfigurationException - if the path doesn't exist or is not an array

    • findInArray

      public Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> findInArray(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode root, String arrayPath, Function<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode,Boolean> predicate) throws ConfigurationException
      Find the first element in an array that matches a predicate
      Parameters:
      root - The root JSON node
      arrayPath - The path to the array
      predicate - The predicate to test elements
      Returns:
      The first matching element, or empty if none match
      Throws:
      ConfigurationException - if the path doesn't exist or is not an array

      Parameters:
      root - The root JSON node
      objectPath - The path to the object
      Returns:
      A list of field names
